website_summaries.verdict: This cage is a two in one, offering a bunny house which can attach to one end of the cage, or be used separately for more rabbit living space.
pros: Bunny house roof opens at the top for easy access to your rabbit
Wide side opening on the cage
Bunny house separates completely from the cage
Very long at 55" to give a lot of room for your rabbit to stretch
Base can be separated for easy cleaning
cons: The pieces on this bunny hutch can be difficult to put together
The large door is good for cleaning, but can also let your rabbit escape easily

customer_reviews.title: Spacious & worth the expense
customer_reviews.text: I was in the market for a “real” rabbit cage, after a year of having a free-range bunny with a puppy playpen for the occasional “timeout”. My husband & I were merging homes, and that included 2 large dogs. I needed a place for Bunny to feel safe & secure amidst the chaos. This cage is extremely spacious, for a cage. It was a pain to put together, but well worth the 3 hours of frustration. Bunny loves the little perch, although I did remove the ladder, as it is basically pointless. My Lionhead is about 4-5 lbs, & this cage was perfect for her. Definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda McDevitt

customer_reviews.title: Slide the pieces to fit.
customer_reviews.text: When I bought this there was only one review that said the pieces didn't fit together properly. I did also have some issues putting it together until we figured out that the pieces are suppose to slide it. Once we figured that out, it was a piece of cake. Pretty time consuming but not to difficult. My rabbits love it and their is tons of room for them to move around. Great features, the only thing I bought separately was a litter box. :)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Deep pan makes this easy to clean and keeps the area around it clean.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered it and got it the same day. Cannot beat that!! So far it’s huge, impressive and seems pretty secure. I’m not sure how long it will last, but I’m guessing that as long as I don’t throw it around it’ll be fine. It’s huge. I have one bunny and it’s like a mansion for them. The best part of this is that it has a deep pan that is very easy to clean. The house has a large lid you can lift and clean that pan too, which is the same as the main pan. Plastic, deep and easy to clean. Keeps the garage clean. Make sure you have a tiny Phillips head. The screws are small.
customer_reviews.author: jess

customer_reviews.title: Hard to clean and too easy to open
customer_reviews.text: Well, both my bunny and my toddler figured out how to open this cage on the second day! The whole side lifts up as the doorway. So every time you open it the bunny will definitely come out. it is also difficult to get a thorough clean since you either have to reach in the side or take apart the whole thing again. I would not buy this cage again. I would get one that has the trays that pull out underneath or a cage that pops off the base. I was also really excited about the little house but my bunny rarely uses it.
customer_reviews.author: monica

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy this cage.
customer_reviews.text: Lots of potential, nothing to show for it. The plastic was flimsy and several parts were broken on arrival. The wood was splintered and seemed to be of poor quality. For this kind of money, I would expect better.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to assemble, but our guinea pig loves it
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for our guinea pig as we wanted to give her a little more room to run than in her old cage. While it took the better part of the day to assemble (instructions are frustratingly unclear in places), it has been holding up well, and is a good bit larger than what she had. Water bottle works ok, and the size of the base is ideal to use with one of the reusable guinea pig mats which has made cleaning much easier. I'd be a bit worried this is on the small size for some rabbits, but for guinea pigs it's ideal.
customer_reviews.author: Ewan Grantham

customer_reviews.title: Having two people helps putting it together a lot easier
customer_reviews.text: I love the cage, bigger space for my bubba Thumper to roll around and a nice little spot for his food and hay. I didn't install the shelf for more room, but have the extension set up for more room for him. Some of the plastic was chipped upon arrival but I can't fault the product for that I fault the delivery service so I'm not taking stars away based on that. The side door is the only way to access the cage so every time I open it to feed him he comes flying out but that's fine he is a good boy I always let him roam. Overall great band for your buck, your bunny should love it!
customer_reviews.author: Brett Vecc

customer_reviews.title: Roomy for guinea pig pair
customer_reviews.text: This cage arrived quickly and in good shape with all parts. It was challenging to put together the wooden portion especially the lid. You'll want a good philips head screwdriver. My two guinea pigs love the space. They love hiding in the house when company is noisy. See pics for how 2 adult guinea pigs fit. My only complaint is the fitting of the front of the wooden house is imperfect against the plastic base, and there's a plastic ridge/bump right in the doorway where their feet would step and they've already chewed on it. See closeup pic. I'm going to try to saw it off and sand it down.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this home for my piggies!
customer_reviews.text: I originally had the other version of this cage without the wooden house so was smaller and I seen this one and you get the house so extra room for them to play and run around! I have 2 Piggies and they absolutely love this home! I constantly hear them zooming around back and forth to there new wooden house to the other side of cage! So cute! If you had bunnies this would also be a great fit! Very roomy! Glad I bought it! There was no directions putting together that was the only thing I didn’t like but I got through it!
customer_reviews.author: Missy!

customer_reviews.title: Beware! Can kill your small pet.
customer_reviews.text: We had our guinea pigs in a Ferplast 140 for only 3 weeks when one of them got her head trapped under the steps and suffocated. The shock of that then killed her sister and both my daughters are traumatized. The design of the step platform allows a small animal to push her head underneath it, but then it’s too stiff and wide For the animal to push her body all the way through or to pull her head back out. Then your pet - or pets- die.
customer_reviews.author: Nikolas F.

customer_reviews.title: Much larger than expected. Very happy with it.
customer_reviews.text: Wow this thing is huge! I never expected it to be so big but it's perfect. It's going to be way more than enough room for two guinea pigs. It didn't take long to put together, maybe a half an hour. I didn't have trouble at all fitting the pieces together. It came wrapped tightly so no pieces were broken. My only issue was the door to get into the cage. That might get a little annoying after a while and cleanup is going to be a challenge since it would be a pain to unfasten the top of the cage and the attached box. I'll update my review once we've gotten some good use out of the cage.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Really Big!
customer_reviews.text: My guinea pigs love this cage, they were super happy and jumping all over the place when I first transferred them from their smaller cage. It's a little harder replacing food and water due to the cage being closed on top so you can't just reach in from above to do that. My only real gripe is that the water bottle that comes with this is totally worthless. It is flimsy and continually falls off its mount. Worst water bottle I have ever seen, just throw it away and buy a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: F. Kepley

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for big bunnies!
customer_reviews.text: The add on hutch was a pain to put together. Though the holes were already marked, the smaller screws were very difficult to get flush against the wood. Overall, the cage was worth it. I have an even bigger bunny, and this cage will fit nicely! I do love the roomy add on hutch. Be sure to have a helper if you buy the add on hutch. The instructions were basically understandable. Nothing really hard to follow.
customer_reviews.author: rbuser

customer_reviews.title: Complicated assembly, poorly fit parts, okay habitat.
customer_reviews.text: After discovering that some of the pieces don't fit very well inside of the cage with the wooden hut, I decided to simplify and leave the tray and feeding tray out altogether. It works well now. The major down side to this cage is the complicated assembly, no pre-drilled holes on most of wood hutch and the poor fit and construction of the assembly pieces to some of the plastic and wire parts. But overall, I was able to jury-rig it to my liking.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie Lynn Stephens

customer_reviews.title: Total Rip Off
customer_reviews.text: I have had this cage for roughly 3 months and it is already falling apart. I have a Polish Rabbit, he is maybe 3LBS. It is not him doing the damage. The wire rods have all come loose. I don’t feel like they were welded together but rather just stuck together with the coating on the metal. If I could give the sturdiness a negative star rating I would. Only redeeming feature is the front opening door but he spends so much time out of the cage it’s not even worth it. Wish I could get my money back, I feel totally scammed.
customer_reviews.author: Kailee

customer_reviews.title: It'll work
customer_reviews.text: Cage doesn't feel very sturdy, definitely need to add zip ties just for my sanity. Don't really care for the way the door is designed, seems very flimsy. Since there will be an Xpen around it it doesn't really matter for me. Definitely not a cage I would use as a stand alone cage. Ended up returning the cage, it just did not live up to my expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Keri Lynn Julius

customer_reviews.title: Very large and roomy for a bun.
customer_reviews.text: Assembly directions could have been a bit clearer. Product is wonderful! I was worried if it would be big enough for Bun Bun. It's soooooo big! He absolutely loves it. One if the things I appreciate the most is that the food dish cannot be flipped. He loves to flip his food dishes. He absolutely can't with this.
customer_reviews.author: Tina Keller

customer_reviews.title: After that it is a good cage for indoors
customer_reviews.text: It's a large cage that could house 2 bunnies. The instructions are worthless. Rely on your intellect. I had to cut off 2 taps from sides that snap into bottom of cage because they cover 2 holes & yet still 2 of the plastic pegs didn't line up with holes so I had to cut them off to snap sides on. After that it is a good cage for indoors. The front that opens up you have to clip to side of cage or bunnies could get out. Buy clips or use piece of thin wire to twist on to lock front down
customer_reviews.author: CIndy Ann Camalieri

customer_reviews.title: lots of room
customer_reviews.text: the rabbit loves his new home, plenty of room to roam, enclosed area to hide and shelter, only draw back is you don't have any small access doors to just add food or treats in, you must open the whole side hinged section to add in food, over all its a great home for any lucky rabbit..
customer_reviews.author: Dan M.

customer_reviews.title: Not kid or bunny friendly... returning
customer_reviews.text: Not kid friendly not bunny friendly... suppose if you wanted kids to stay out and not access pets and difficult to access to feed/water... no easy access... flimsy... sending back the two we ordered and keeping the other sturdier kid friendly two we ordered and possibly ordering two more of that kind
customer_reviews.author: Brandy

customer_reviews.title: Nice big cage, not so easy to clean.
customer_reviews.text: It’s a great size, bunny has a lot of room to run. The wood hutch needed a little extra reinforcement with a nail gun (according to my husband) It would be nice if it opened from the top for easy cleaning. I put down puppy pee pads but the bunny just drags them around.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good cage
customer_reviews.text: This cage worked wonderfully for a bit of time, then my rabbit learned to escape it, even with all of the clips on. She also chewed the plastic and the bars, even when I let her out for hours and hours each day. I ended up using this as a home base, and having her free roam in my room. She still enjoys going into her cage to relax sometimes. I think this cage would be beautiful for guinea pigs though!
customer_reviews.author: Janie Gaffney

customer_reviews.title: Spacious but could use improvements
customer_reviews.text: Oh sheesh! Took forever to put the pieces together! It wasn’t definitely easy. Overall, it looks nice and very spacious but I will say a few things. For a price like this, I expected better. Some of the wood has dents and too burnt. The instruction was sht! Not very useful but there’s a YouTube video on how to assemble it. The water bottle that came with it isn’t even useful at all. At first I thought I put too much water because it wouldn’t hold and kept slipping, then I took half of it out and it still leaked until all the water come out, so I decided to use the meal bowl as water bowl instead.
customer_reviews.author: Nuku

customer_reviews.title: Our larger size lop loves this hutch
customer_reviews.text: aesthetically nice indoor hutch. our rabbit appreciates the separate sleeping quarters. large enough area for bun to stretch out and still accommodate a generous litter box. the upper tier is a joke though for medium to large rabbits; it would work for smaller size rodents.
customer_reviews.author: alicia

customer_reviews.title: It’s a hassle to put together and parts don’t line up as well
customer_reviews.text: It’s a pretty nice looking cage but It took over an hour or maybe 2 trying to put it together just because the parts were not lining up, I had to use force and even with force I was unable to get some parts to click together so I had to rig my cage to keep it together, I don’t recommend buying. Very irritable.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Pretty awesome crate
customer_reviews.text: Pretty awesome crate, only reason I'm not giving it 5 stars is I feel the opening on the side is a bit tedious to use. I have a crate which opens from the top & Id much rather have preferred this one to do the same. Other than that, the crate is easy to assemble and clean, comes with all you need in terms of a starter kit and is pretty sturdy. Our bunnies seem to like it and we haven't had any problems with it. The nest box/house is also quite spacious and they love the hideout option.
customer_reviews.author: Abdallah1212

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to assemble, can't be done alone and very flimsy.
customer_reviews.text: Built horribly. None of the pieces match up, it's extremely flimsy and impossible to build by yourself. It's an overpriced piece of junk. It's huge, which is beneficial I guess but there are tons of other cages on the market that you can get for half the price that are built much better and less aggravating to assemble. All in all, do your research and definitely consider choosing another option.
customer_reviews.author: Sadie

customer_reviews.title: Great cage
customer_reviews.text: Very spacious cage for our bunny that is roughly 5-6 pounds. She loves the enclosed area and the raised 'porch' area! Be aware there is assembly required, so have a screwdriver on hand to assemble the wooden pieces. Also, we didn't install the piece of cage which opens and closes as our bunny is free to roam the house, and it didn't negatively affect any other parts of the cage!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Anne

customer_reviews.title: Very Spacious
customer_reviews.text: I had no idea how huge rabbits could be until I inherited one as a pet. Our rabbit is basically the size of a small dog/Yorkie, so I was skeptical about the size of this habitat. Fortunately, she fits very comfortably in this cage and has plenty of extra room. It was one of the only cages available that has the plastic rim around it to avoid her kicking the bedding out of the cage,
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome cage!!
customer_reviews.text: This product is quite literally, huge. We love it! There’s so much space for my bun to use the restroom and hope around. His favorite spot is under the “shelf”. My only complaint is that no matter how much sliding and wiggling you do, some pieces just don’t fit. But we fixed that problem with some zip ties! The piece that didn’t fit were the black connectors to hold the corners together. Overall I recommend this cage. Worth the money. Big, spacious, and gets my bunny out of my creation made from a shoe shelf.😂
customer_reviews.author: Aspen

customer_reviews.title: Does the job but not sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Spacious and cute initial cage for a bunny which was pretty easy to clean however, not at all sturdy. Can’t load weight onto the top, and the door was super flimsy. Also wish there was an opening on the top. It also came with a part broken, which was pretty disappointing considering how expensive this cage was. There are probably more affordable options out there.
customer_reviews.author: Therese

customer_reviews.title: Nice size, bunny is satisfied.
customer_reviews.text: Changing my review: Slightly damaged during shipment, one of the plastic sides chipped off but still usable. Had issues fitting the box onto the cage but after screwing the box all together it fit just fine. Bunny likes having more room.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan Coyle

customer_reviews.title: Spacious
customer_reviews.text: Works great for our hedgehog. So much space and the open top flap makes it great to check for when she has babies without disturbing them.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Black

customer_reviews.title: my piggies love it but, it’s such a pain putting it together
customer_reviews.text: my piggies love it and it is a very nice cage but, its such a pain trying to put it together!!!! I ordered two of these cages because I have for guinea pigs and they put two guinea pigs in one cage and my other two guinea pigs in the other cage my piggies popcorn all around it it’s a bit tinier than I expected it to be but it’s still pretty large🤔👌👍🏻🐹
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer L. Ward

customer_reviews.title: Nice cage, great size
customer_reviews.text: We bought this cage for our bunny. It is great, there is plenty of room to roam and I really like the house. It’s easy to open and easy to clean. The bunny is now litter trained and it is our new hedgehog’s house and works great for her too.
customer_reviews.author: JL

customer_reviews.title: A bit difficult to assemble, but fantastic once done!!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my rabbit after she escaped from her last cage, so I decided it was time for an upgrade. It’s much larger than I had anticipated but that was my fault for not being prepared. My rabbit got used to it very quickly and even likes the attachable hutch despite never really having a hiding place before!! Should I ever need another cage, I’d buy this one again but I don’t see that happening soon.
customer_reviews.author: katrina rule

customer_reviews.title: Difficult To Assemble
customer_reviews.text: I honestly really like the cage. Its large and roomy and it is a good home for my 2 bunnies. My big complaint is that the wooden nesting box was hell to put together. It only has sharpie marks where the screws where to go, im lucky I had a small drill that I could use to make the holes. I had to drill all the hole myself which was irritating. I feel like it should have stated this in the infomarion that the buyer was going to need power tools to put it together.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poor latch, hard to clean
customer_reviews.text: This cage is extremely hard to clean, i have to climb in almost every day. The latches are not strong. Sometimes I want to take it outside to let the rabbits get some sunshine but the locking tabs are not strong and a predator could easily get in. Seller please reach out to give me some feedback on this cage.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: Finally had to throw this in the trash. Does not clean well, cage door doesn't secure that well and my rabbits have managed to escape so had to place a large heavy box in front of it so they couldn't open it. Not that easy to put together, and wire cage is too flimsy and unsecure....very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: JD

customer_reviews.title: Good quality cage but hard assemble
customer_reviews.text: Its a perfect size for my rabbit would of givin it 5 stars if it was easier to build but its a great cage nice and sturdy and easy to clean i would recommend this for any beginner rabbit owner
customer_reviews.author: Unknown

customer_reviews.title: Cheap
customer_reviews.text: Cheaply made. Lots of plastic and mine got to be with several broken pieces. Things dont fit together flush so I found myself fitting things together so that they just "worked". Hugely disappointed for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Love it and hate it!!
customer_reviews.text: The base of the cage had a two inch crack in it and the platform had a tab broken off upon receipt. My daughter was already set to get the guinea pigs and so I super glued the base and put it together. The water bottle is cheap and leaks badly, but already expected that. The hay feeder has no way to attach to the cage. There are holes in the bottom but nothing sent to attach it to the cage. The cage is nice for the most part, especially the hutch, but also cheap on the other hand.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pieces chipped/damaged, otherwise good
customer_reviews.text: Pieces came broken. It all still went together, but receiving broken parts is no fun. Also, the wood house doesn’t fit / line up with the cage very well so any time the cage is moved it pops out of alignment and has to be put back. I definitely wouldn’t use this outside as it isn’t sturdy at all. It seems like it will do the job good. It’s a very big cage.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth S

customer_reviews.title: cheap plastic
customer_reviews.text: The first one came broken and Amazon replaced it no problem The 2nd one came and again it was broken in a different place So this tells me that it is cheap plastic is being used also not a sturdy cage
customer_reviews.author: Chris Hutchinson

customer_reviews.title: This design would be great if made with durable
customer_reviews.text: Ordered item because it had a 4 star review. Arrived yesterday and I sent it back this afternoon. The base had a small crack and the wood house missing a part. It is made of the cheapest plastic material and so flimsy. Rabbits are classic chewers, this cage would be chewed up in less than a week (not safe!) Giving it a 1 star because I had to. This design would be great if made with durable, strong materials.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: good enough
customer_reviews.text: It's large and looks good. Sturdiness is meh and the doors are an absolute pain. I like the suicide option and my cavvies seem to enjoy it.
customer_reviews.author: tSaki

customer_reviews.title: Came late and cracked everywhere
customer_reviews.text: Not only did this show up late, which isnt their fault but doesnt help, mine was broken in pieces when it arrived. It was didnt include the wire bottom, which I wasnt planning on using anyway but they were still missing which is just unacceptable. I can't return it cause where would my rabbit live but now he lives in a cage that had to be repatched and finagled to be safe for him.
customer_reviews.author: Lysha

customer_reviews.title: Rabbit Cage
customer_reviews.text: This is a pretty sturdy cage, i must admit. I won’t lie I was pretty mad when I realized I needed a drill and putting the base was slightly difficult. There are videos that show you how to put it together wayyy easier on YouTube so I’d definitely utilIze them. My bunny doesn’t use the hutch as of yet. I’m not sure if it’s because it’s dark or what? But the size is PERFECT!
customer_reviews.author: cynthia

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Instructions, lol. You need wire cutters to take off extra to make assembly work. After 45 minutes we got it assembled.
customer_reviews.author: J. Edwards

customer_reviews.title: Bunny house
customer_reviews.text: Came in damaged broken pieces but we couldn’t send it back Bc we had already bought the bunny and it needed a home so we made it work
customer_reviews.author: trisha hoosier

customer_reviews.title: Great for medium size bunny
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my female bunny she loves it, it’s enough room for her to eat and sleep in also enough room to have her potty box in it. I would highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Royal Relle

customer_reviews.title: Came late & damaged. LOW QUALITY! RETURNED.
customer_reviews.text: RETURNED! Cage came delivered late and broken. The metal siding was bent. The cage does not have pull out tray system. Very low quality.
customer_reviews.author: RotundX

customer_reviews.title: Yes!!
customer_reviews.text: It wasn’t hard to put together but definitely need a little better instructions to go by. But it is huge and my baby girl loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Barton

customer_reviews.title: Arrived damaged
customer_reviews.text: It’s nice and big however it arrived chipped. And damaged both the wood is chipped and also appears to be chipped on the plastic as well. It’s a lot to spend to have it chipped also, would be a lot to return it so I’m stuck with a chipped cage. The box was also open as well
customer_reviews.author: Krista Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase - Have time to put it together!
customer_reviews.text: We love this hutch for our Norwegian Dwarf rabbit, but man it was a pain to put together. I've put together my fair share of furniture and things like that, and this was by far a more time consuming project.
customer_reviews.author: Sadie

customer_reviews.title: Quality product.
customer_reviews.text: Very large indoor enclosure for a rabbit, mini lop. Fairly easy to assemble but make sure you give yourself about a hour to do it. Perfect for bringing our outdoor bunny in for a hurricane.
customer_reviews.author: rhowardak

customer_reviews.title: My bunny is happy.
customer_reviews.text: It was a pain to put together. It took my husband and me two and a half hours to put together. However, our bunny is very happy. Not big enough for 2 bunnies. But it's perfect for him. It is good with keeping his mess inside the cage with the bottom and not all over the floor.
customer_reviews.author: April Whitehurst

customer_reviews.title: Cage set up
customer_reviews.text: Holy crap does it suck to set this up! Took 2 hours!! The screw holes do not line up at all and the "holes" aren't holes they are black marks. Almost split the wood! The directions are terrible. Very pretty when done. Just still not sure if it's worth all the stress.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa Reeser

customer_reviews.title: Good quality habitat for small animals.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to house chicks not rabbits. It’s very spacious and sturdy. Took about an hour to put together. Very good quality, and my chicks feel safe from curious dogs and murderous cat.
customer_reviews.author: ASHGIL

customer_reviews.title: Bunny Cage is awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Very simple to snap together. Bunny is still a baby, but it has been quite simple to keep in my son's bedroom with no odors...except for my son, that is....lol. Great item. Be sure to measure your space so you know for sure it will fit into any space you have that is tight.
customer_reviews.author: SoHonestItHurts

customer_reviews.title: Missing Parts.
customer_reviews.text: Missing a bunch of parts, no bowl, no water cup, no wire metals. Supper annoyed!
customer_reviews.author: sheira argote

customer_reviews.title: Great space but not best quality
customer_reviews.text: The cage is great for size! Cage was not easy to put together! I suggest you know where you want to put it because it’s not very easy to move nor is it stable to stay together! The front opening of the cage makes it very difficult to get our rabbits out of! It would be much better if we could open cage from top! The water bottle holder is horrible and doesn’t hold bottle well! It falls off easily!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Is nice and big and has been working well. The only problem is the water bottle falls off bars.
customer_reviews.author: Lois Williamson

customer_reviews.title: very nice Munchie my girl rabbit loves it
customer_reviews.text: we got it for one of our rabbits that getting ready to have babies she loves it
customer_reviews.author: Robert K.

customer_reviews.title: replacement GREAT.
customer_reviews.text: Replacement was great.( we think the first one was a parts & pieces throw together) fit together as expected. Guinea pigs like it well. the extra room is perfect. No complaints here. Highly recommend. Thank you Amazon for your help in returning & replacing the product.
customer_reviews.author: dukkmiller

customer_reviews.title: Best value
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect cage. Couldn't ask for a better and for the price. My wife n kids love it, especially the rabbit.
customer_reviews.author: Danny

customer_reviews.title: Great size poor quality
customer_reviews.text: I love the size, but the quality and strength of the material is not good. The elevated platform broke only 2 weeks after assembly. And there are only 2 Hotot dwarfs in the enclosure.
customer_reviews.author: G.Michael Caballero

customer_reviews.title: flimsy and damaged.
customer_reviews.text: The product arrived to me in a damaged box with missing parts. The sides of the cage are very flimsy, and do not look sturdy. The size of the cage was nice, however I am in the process of returning I do not trust that this cage is sturdy enough to house a rabbit, and obviously missing pieces to a package is very upsetting when you pay this amount of money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my rabbit!!!
customer_reviews.text: Okay this cage was annoying to build but I give it 5 stars anyways because it is so amazing!! My holland lop, Wagner, loves this cage so much. He immediately got on the little shelf and he hangs out in the wood hut at night. The water bottle leaks but the hay feeder and bowl are cool! Definitely worth the money and the set up because I don’t feel bad about leaving him when I’m at work or school anymore. My dad calls it Wag’s “trailer” lol
customer_reviews.author: Avery Cobb

customer_reviews.title: Way bigger than I thought
customer_reviews.text: Finn the lop ear rabbits new Castle he loves it
customer_reviews.author: Jerry

customer_reviews.title: Large rabbit, large cage
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my daughters Flemish giant mixed breed. It is large and perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Leeann Barbee

customer_reviews.title: not what you see
customer_reviews.text: it comes apart when you try to feed the rabbit.cleaning it does the same.would not buy it again
customer_reviews.author: mary Lake

customer_reviews.title: Great cage
customer_reviews.text: My bun loves this cage. She free roams in my room when I am home otherwise she’s happy in the cage when she has to be in it. Plenty of room for a bunny to stay in for a while. Very difficult to assemble. Took two people and a couple of hours to put it together, instructions weren’t that helpful but it was worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Snickers loves it!
customer_reviews.text: Our dwarf bunny loves his new home. It is HUGE!
customer_reviews.author: Kimi Kearns

customer_reviews.title: easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my daughter's rabbit, who is in her room. Looks nicer than the usual cage, easy to clean, a lot of room for him until she comes home from school.
customer_reviews.author: C. Marinoank

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: The bottom is built well however the wire cage on top does not fit well or secure well into the bottom
customer_reviews.author: nikole

customer_reviews.title: This is a great size and offers a lot of activity space
customer_reviews.text: I use this for two Guinea Pigs. This is a great size and offers a lot of activity space. I do find it difficult to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Minton

customer_reviews.title: Really liked it. Wish it had a bottom grate to ...
customer_reviews.text: Really liked it. Wish it had a bottom grate to keep the rabbit above her waste though. Large and roomy for indoor cage. Needs to be cleaned every day.
customer_reviews.author: Gayle Young

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: I read on some reviews that the pieces don't fit, THEY DO! You really have to audibly hear the click noise to know that it is in. It was really difficult to get it in but once it's in it's great! Super spacious for my bunny. The water bottle that comes with it is pretty terrible and my bunny couldn't drink from it so I would suggest buying another kind.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa Munoz

customer_reviews.title: Great but hard to put together !
customer_reviews.text: It is very hard to put together, the Wooden section of the cage. I spent atleast 2 hours alone on it, but the rest was pretty straight forward, but the parts involving the wooden expansion
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble and very spacious. Our bunny Cocoa loves her new house. It took a little while for her to accept something new but as you can see in the photos, she eventually warmed up to it. The cage is very sturdy and the (removable) house portion has plenty of room as well.
customer_reviews.author: Bobby Z

customer_reviews.title: Cage for New bunny
customer_reviews.text: Huge cage / fairly easy to set up with 2 people! Hope bunny likes it too ! Lol
customer_reviews.author: lisa marie Sutton-jenders

customer_reviews.title: Terrible, don’t buy!!
customer_reviews.text: TERRIBLE! The first one I ordered had several missing parts, the replacement came and has several BROKEN PIECES! I cannot believe that I wasted money on this. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Jillian Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: It’s big and it’s amaxing
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t realize exactly how big this cage is. My rabbit loves it! It was really easy to put together and I loved how it had pre drilled holes. Made it easier to do it by hand.
customer_reviews.author: Asia Fulgham

customer_reviews.title: Our rabbit really likes the 2 enclosed places to relax ...
customer_reviews.text: Our rabbit really likes the 2 enclosed places to relax and she stays cleaner due to having bedding in different places.
customer_reviews.author: May

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: My daughter chose this for her bunny and it works very nice for being in her room.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: excellent rabbit cage.
customer_reviews.text: My bunny loved this cage so much that I recently ordered another one for my other bunny. It is easy to clean, bunny has lots of room, he can even hide in the wooden enclosure. The cage is well made and sturdy. We love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Gail Franklin

customer_reviews.title: It was really used
customer_reviews.text: This was suppose to be a box that had been repackaged, it was so used and broken on the base. Seriously used. I have gotten other thing used, but this was a bit much. I needed it so I had to fix and try and secure it. Nice big cage, rabbit and my son are happy, so yeah.
customer_reviews.author: Cori York

customer_reviews.title: Very Good cage.
customer_reviews.text: Definitely a good cage. I would recommend watching YouTube on how to assemble this cage. It can be a bit overwhelming if you're not into assembling.
customer_reviews.author: Ruth Baugh

customer_reviews.title: Great size!
customer_reviews.text: My kids put this together before I got home. They said that it was easy and all of the parts were there. Spacious for sure and I love that it opens in the front. I thought that I wouldn’t like the black and white metal mix but the white coated sides are the ones that open, so it makes sense.
customer_reviews.author: Ayca

customer_reviews.title: Very spacious!!
customer_reviews.text: Nice and spacious for our 3 guinea pigs. Much better than the ones with the canvas type bottom. Wire top is a little flimsy so I’m gonna put a couple cable ties on the corners. Overall well worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: sallie fauble

customer_reviews.title: Very little protection when shipped.
customer_reviews.text: Well, we tossed the old cage and were building this one. We started to unbox it and this is the corner...not great for animals that urinate. :) can’t say it’s sturdy if I am receiving it like this.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Super big!
customer_reviews.text: This cage is very spacious and our rabbit loves it! He loved exploring and the house is a perfect hideaway. There is also a nice hiding spot under the shelf. Room for a litter box and a standing water feeder. Would highly recommend this cage.
customer_reviews.author: insb

customer_reviews.title: Overall, VERY satisfied for my BUNNY.
customer_reviews.text: Overall, I’m satisfied. It was a bit challenging to assemble. Front cage latch was flimsy plastic that BUNNY can open with ease. As long as the cage front is open, my bunny loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great cage
customer_reviews.text: It’s a great cage. It wasn’t too easy to assemble though
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love the cage
customer_reviews.text: Love the cage! I use it when I go out of town and my inlaws take care of my rabbit. Big cage!
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: So far I love it! Going to get a baby rabbit this ...
customer_reviews.text: So far I love it! Going to get a baby rabbit this weekend so we will see how he likes it, but it went together pretty easily and seems well built!
customer_reviews.author: Mwebb

customer_reviews.title: Best cage ever!!!
customer_reviews.text: It’s HUGE!!! A lot bigger than I had anticipated, perfect for my two bunnies, the absolutely love it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Danica

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Our bunny is very happy with this product. Easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: bailey

customer_reviews.title: Very spacious cage for a decent price!
customer_reviews.text: Bunnies love it :). I wanted to pull my hair out building the wooden hutch though. Anyway I persisted for the bunnies.
customer_reviews.author: Justin

product_meta.title: Ferplast Krolik Rabbit Cage | Extra-Large Rabbit Cage w/Wood or Wire Hutch | Rabbit Cage Includes All Accessories
product_meta.description: Style:Rabbit Cage w/ Wood HutchThe extra-large Krolik rabbit cage in burgundy with the included wood hutch extension by Ferplast measures 55.9L x 23.6W x 19.7H inches and is an ideal choice as a rabbit cage, guinea pig cage & a chinchilla cage! Each extra-large rabbit cage comes with the wood hutch extension plus all of the accessories you need to make a perfect habitat for your rabbit including a hay feeder, large water bottle, feeding bowl & an elevated feeding area so your rabbit has a clean area to eat/drink from. This rabbit cage is easy to assembly with no tools required, includes an easy-to-clean 5.5" deep plastic base that contains litter inside the rabbit's home & has a powder coated wire top to ensure this cage will last! This rabbit cage provides your pet with a large living area for maximum comfort & a full front door access for easy cleaning or access to your rabbit. The wood hutch extension portion of the rabbit cage provides privacy, is an ideal place for nesting & features a full top door equipped with lock. The extension portion of the rabbit cage measures24L x 18W x 19.25H - inches. Ferplast stands behind the quality of our products with a 1-Year Manufacturer's Warranty. If you have any questions about this product our customer service department would be glad to help you. Customer service can be contacted at: 1-800-428-8560, available 9:00 AM - 4:00 PM, Monday - Friday.
feature_bullets: Perfect Rabbit Cage Starter Kit w/ Wood Hutch Extension | Rabbit cage includes large water bottle, feeding bowl, hay feeder, elevated feeding area ideal for rabbits, guinea pigs or chinchillas
Extra-Extra-Large Living Space | Rabbit cage measures 55.9L x 23.62W x 19.7H inches & includes a wood hutch ideal for nesting that creates a private living quarters for your pet
Easy Maintenance Rabbit Cage | Krolik features a 5.5" deep base to contain litter & entire base of the rabbit cage detaches for cleaning or dumping of litter / debris
Convenient Access | Full front door provides quick access inside the rabbit cage; wood hutch features a locking top panel w/ full access
Ferplast Quality Guarantee | Rabbit cage includes 1-Year Manufacturer's Warranty
